results.content:
This course provided a great preview of what is coming in Bootstrap 4. The takeaways and knowledge gained here will help you by allowing you to adjust for upcoming changes to more easily update your designs for Bootstrap 4. 

The instructor was very clear and concise and also provided some good insight into possible directions Bootstrap may be going as well as some good resources to keep an eye on as things progress towards release. Overall a great course!
